page.title: 20HATCH BEAUCHAMP SCHOOL
page.content: The school was originally built of stone and in 1875 consisted of only one classroom with an adjoining house where the teacher lived. Later, the hall was added to the school. Later still, a mobile classroom block arrived and this now houses the infant class and the school kitchen. Another change came to the old building when, the toilet block was added and the school house was converted into an office, staff_room and library. Today, there are 45 pupils and one part_time and two full_time teachers. The pupils who worked on this Domesday Project were: Rachel Anderson, Simon Brittain, Katy Bulger, Matthew Day, Christopher Hare, Ruth Parsons, Zoe Pring, Melissa Rossiter and Mark Sutton.
